Title: 2000 Gibson Les Paul Studio Electric Guitar Black Gold Hardware, Hardshell Case
ConditionDescription: Needs some love , thats for sure but lots of potential. Various types surface imperfections, scratches, nicks and play wear which seem normal for a guitar that has been played and loved for 19 years. There is play wear on the body- multiple body edge enamel chips, frets are in poor shape, including minor scratches and dings. No pickguard, missing and rusted screw in various parts. Will need a set up.
